14090.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Kekeke. So that's how it is.
To complete this training, you must be
Polfan's disciple after all.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14090.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……ククク。そうだったのか。
　この修行をこなすとは　やはり
　お前は　ポルファンの弟子だな。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14090.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……큭큭큭, 그래.
　이 수련을 하는 걸 보니
　역시 넌 포르판의 제자였군.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14090.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……呵呵呵。这样啊。
能够完成这个修行，
你果然是珀尔凡的弟子。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14090.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……呵呵呵。這樣啊。
能夠完成這個修行，
你果然是珀爾凡的弟子。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14091.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>I used to be his disciple a long time ago.
In other words, I'm your predecessor in
a way.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14091.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「オレも　かつては　あいつの弟子だった。
　言うなれば　お前の兄弟子ってとこだな。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14091.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 나도 한때는 그 녀석의 제자였다.
　따지자면 네 사형이 되는 셈이지.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14091.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我过去也是那家伙的弟子。
说起来，还是你师兄呢。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14091.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我過去也是那傢伙的弟子。
說起來，還是你師兄呢。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14092.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Don't you know, <pc>?Only those
who complete Polfan's training can
unlock the true potential of the minstrel.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14092.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「知ってるか？　<pc>。
　この修行をこなした奴だけが
　伝説の旅芸人に　近づけるんだぜ？<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14092.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 그거 아나?
　이 수련을 마친 녀석만이
　전설의 유랑 예능인에 가까워질 수 있다.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14092.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>你知道吗？<pc>。
只有完成了这项修行的人，
才能接近传说中的旅行艺人哟？<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14092.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>你知道嗎？<pc>。
只有完成了這項修行的人，
才能接近傳說中的旅行藝人喔？<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14093.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>I had nearly finished my training when I gave
up. But as it is, you and I are evenly
matched in skill.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14093.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「オレも　修行を終えたところだ。
　あの時は勝ちをゆずったが　今　この時において
　オレと　お前は　互角ということよ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14093.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 나도 막 수련을 마친 참이다.
　저번에는 네게 승리를 내줬지만
　이제 나와 넌 호각.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14093.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我也刚刚完成了修行。
之前虽然是你赢了，但现在你我不分上下。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14093.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我也正完成了修行。
之前雖然是你贏了，但現在你我不分上下。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14094.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Even so, nothing can stop me! I will
become the strongest and unlock the
true potential of the minstrel!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14094.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「フハハ！　オレは　誰にも止められねえ！
　いずれ最強となり　世の中から恐れられる
　伝説の旅芸人になってやるぜ！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14094.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 흐하하! 이제 아무도 날 막을 수 없어!
　언젠가 가장 강해져 온 세상 사람들이
　두려워하는 전설의 유랑 예능인이 될 거다!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14094.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>呼哈哈！谁都无法阻止我！
总有一天我要成为世人所畏惧的
传说中的最强旅行艺人！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14094.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>呼哈哈！誰都無法阻止我！
總有一天我要成為最強，
成為世人所畏懼的傳說旅行藝人！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14095.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Kill those fool who are content just
to make people laugh! I'll show the world
that power trumps tricks every time!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14095.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「人を笑わせるだけで　満足してるような
　ふぬけた旅芸人をブッ殺してよおお！！
　芸が役に立たねえことを　世の中に示してやる！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14095.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 고작 사람들을 웃기는 걸로 만족하는
　물러터진 유랑 예능인을 전부 죽여서!!
　개그가 아무짝에 쓸모없다는 걸 증명하겠어!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14095.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我要干掉那些没出息的旅行艺人！！
他们光让人发笑就觉得满足了。
我要让全世界都知道技艺没有丝毫用处！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14095.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我要幹掉那些只要引人發笑
就滿足的窩囊旅行藝人！！
我要讓全世界都知道技藝沒有絲毫用處！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14096.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>...You can't save people with tricks alone.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14096.ja: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……芸で　人なんか救えねえ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14096.ko: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……개그로는 사람을 구할 수 없어.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14096.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……靠技艺根本就无法拯救他人。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14096.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……靠技藝根本就無法拯救他人。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14097.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Get it through your head, <pc>.
Polfan is a scummy trickster who doesn't
have the power to help anyone.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14097.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「頭に　たたきこんでおけ。<pc>。
　ポルファンは　人ひとり救えねえ　クズ芸人だ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14097.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 머릿속에 새겨 둬라, <pc>.
　포르판은 사람 하나 구하지 못하는
　삼류 예능인이란 걸.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14097.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>你记住，<pc>。
珀尔凡是无法拯救他人的垃圾艺人。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14097.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>給我好好記著，<pc>。
珀爾凡是無法拯救他人的垃圾藝人。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
